Text: gnv65, you absolutely rock man! Like I check my mail on a hourly basis, I check your page to see if there are any new uploads! Your page is addictive! Thanks a lot for all these wonderful uploads.. and may you keep up the good work for ever! :-)

Thanks for the compliment novelrook !
It is the selection of books & their description that makes my page addictive. Also a small contributing factor may be lack of too many magazines which I stopped uploading due to many reasons.
I shall keep up this work as long as I can as one never knows with so many IPs/countries blocking TPB.....
You're welcome gnv65...I hope for us, India does not block TPB..
